tweets.text: Day 2 in the ‘fallout’ room HELP! @EnvAgency & @PHE_uk the @RedIndustries2 Walleys landfill stench attack is everywhere. How many complaints now? @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @AaronBell4NUL @NewsNBC see advice for casualties @StinkStopthe #stopthestink https://t.co/MIwl9I26Qe

Something to get passionate about @WaterUK @DefraWater @OfwatChiefExec @EnvAgency have made it this way and can stop it right now - no new law required, just stop bending it. @RachSalv @AnglingTrust @WildlifeTrusts https://t.co/GXWd0xbOKc

Had the LOVELIEST day in #Buxton today to breathe FRESH AIR and bring home water we feel safe to drink. It is CRIMINAL that our home town of NUL @NewsNBC no longer feels SAFE. @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @DefraGovUK @StinkStopthe #stopthestink https://t.co/MewAHIazvg

tweets.text: It's nearly 9pm and I've accidently left a window open upstairs...just ran up to close it before the @RedIndustries2 gas hits us. @EnvAgency do you plan your life around being gassed by H2S? Asking for a friend... #stopthestink #landfill https://t.co/1ZkqqDuDCW

I left my home yesterday due to the stink from Walley’s Quarry owned by Red Industries and supposedly regulated by the inept @EnvAgency. When I turned onto my road tonight I was gagging in my car and my one year old woke up screaming. Shame on you. #StopTheStink @StinkStopthe

@AaronBell4NUL please can you tell us what date you are meeting with @MPGeorgeEustice & @MattHancock This town can’t take much more of this. It must be treated as a national priority & the @EnvAgency @PHE_EoEngland must be held to account #stopthestink https://t.co/eWVGkDkFFj

tweets.text: The @EnvAgency should have listened to the public instead of trying to sweep toxic fumes under the carpet badging them as ‘odour complaints.’ It’s not odour complaints - you’re letting them cause HARM to our physical & mental health @MattHancock @AaronBell4NUL #stopthestink https://t.co/EDiIdIpAff

tweets.text: You know it’s bad when the community has to turn @ErinBrockovich because the authorities are negligent & gaslight their concerns at the same time allowing them to be poisoned by big industries. Shame on you. You STINK! @EnvAgency @claredkeenan @PHE_EoEngland #stopthestink https://t.co/R4k55YiAxW

Just when you think the @EnvAgency are starting to listen there is yet more evidence of lip service @ClareDinnisEA . At this rate we will have to come to the Bristol Head Offices to see you - how else will stop you from taking the mickey out of us?! #stopthestink @StinkStopthe https://t.co/BQRJrvYO8H

Pathetic regulation of the landfill, pathetic management of what is essentially a major incident but deliberately not being identified as one & pathetic PR skills @EnvAgency @PHE_EoEngland .  Sack the lot & start again @BorisJohnson @MattHancock #stopthestink https://t.co/cgJPaRXe7K

tweets.text: Mine is always whether or not the fumes are in the house & / or opening the windows v carefully as narrowly as i can to check if it’s outside. Sad way we are forced to live @EnvAgency @PHE_EoEngland @StinkStopthe #stopthestink https://t.co/0R8pBx2yXb

You know the landfill fumes are a problem when a gent 5 miles away says they’re horrific. Only a matter of time before the health effects spread further @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgency @PHE_EoEngland Your strategy to play this down & gas light our town isn’t working #stopthestink https://t.co/WOuBPHkCDo

My breathing had improved yesterday by the time we got to Buxton , what does that tell me? I’d be a hell of a lot safer & healthier if the @EnvAgency @DefraGovUK @MattHancock @PHE_EoEngland @BorisJohnson shut that damn landfill #stopthestink @StinkStopthe https://t.co/QY2lcaqxsH

Faye
